For every family and every household clean drinking water is an essential necessity of life. Congress must act on this critical legislation that’s long overdue and can make drinking water safer for generations of Americans. #GettheLeadOut   https://t.co/dR9DIlJEFZ https://t.co/Eb1aKbcyi7

#Outrageous! #Guatemalan court upholds 14 years in #prison for Irina & Anastasia #Bitkov for immigration violations. The #Kremlin has a very long reach and longer memory. This is the price the #Bitkovs pay for not caving to demands for #bribes. #corruption #russia #humanrights https://t.co/fFr7KWvPZp

Great news: The House just passed S.4116 to extend the #PaycheckProtectionProgram (PPP) application period to 8/8. In NJ the PPP has already provided 144k+“no payback loans” a lifeline to sustain businesses & pay workers during COVID-19. The extension lets more bizz get help. https://t.co/NSoXxExU8T
Xi Jinping’s assault on #HongKong democracy activists is the latest example of the Chinese Communist Party’s cruelty and weakness.  Click 🔗to read my press release:   https://t.co/N5G9R3iKtS

I cosponsored the #JUSTICEAct by @SenatorTimScott and @RepPeteStauber to bring transparency accountability and ensure the highest attainable law enforcement standards in order to build safer communities. https://t.co/CCqFD6mvay

$50 million in CARES Act--funding I supported--is being used to expand the @NewJerseyEDA Small Business Emergency Assistance Grant Program. Applications open tomorrow at 9:00 AM for Phase 2. First come first served!  https://t.co/0FUR94aEcb

W/today’s PPP Flexibility Act we ensure that 🇺🇸 businesses/workers get continued relief as we battle back from COVID-19 econ impact. 131000 NJ businesses have received >$16b in forgivable loans. This bill extends the lifeline for 16 + weeks as we rebuild. https://t.co/ag63s08Txk

. @SecPompeo is right! #HongKong no longer autonomous. No more of #China’s #HumanRightsViolations and violations of the #HongKong Basic Law. #SanctionChina now! #StandWithHongKong   https://t.co/pyD6fQx5Om   https://t.co/jSkWxZtRIY https://t.co/sTZHcu4Xrs

In observance of Memorial Day we pay tribute to the brave men and women who gave their lives to defend freedom and liberty. We are forever indebted to their patriotism courage valor and sacrifice. https://t.co/xDnxQDBcnu

After working this past week to win a safe easing of COVID-19 restrictions on for-hire fishing boats yesterday I met w/captains & customers in Pt. Pleasant as they boarded party boats & kicked-off the 2020 fluke fishing season.   Click🔗for press release: https://t.co/xNpnRhi8BK

Global Magnitsky sanctions should be imposed on those Chinese government officials who lied and suppressed the truth about #Covid_19 and committed #humanrights abuses against individuals who sought to alert the world about #coronavirus.  https://t.co/p3A1H4wHMU

The Chinese gov't—through its propaganda organ the Global Times—has threatened me & a handful of U.S. lawmakers &officials seeking to legally empower COVID-19 victims to bring lawsuits in U.S. courts against the Chinese gov't. Click🔗to read press release: https://t.co/p3A1H4wHMU

Beijing cannot threaten enough to silence those of us demanding transparency and #humanrights and an end to cyber-hacking and crimes against humanity. Sanctions will not silence me/anyone who wants real answers about the COVID virus's transmission.  https://t.co/dcrtqUnAPa

Thank you @ALZIMPACT. Great to host a virtual town hall with @alzassociation to discuss federal efforts to #endalz & address #COVIDー19 impact on #Alzheimer's patients & family caregivers a larger percent of whom are women.   https://t.co/RZgzkSy1qA https://t.co/SJqgCl3g24

This #NationalPoliceWeek we thank all who serve(d) in law enforcement—during #COVIDー19 & always. At great personal risk they are always there a line of demarcation stopping criminals protecting our communities & keeping us safe. We thank them for their service. https://t.co/GCsCsb8vbI

TY @ecpatusa for the recognition & for all you do to promote #onlinesafety. Bottom line the #Covid_19 pandemic has put women &children at higher risk. We must respond. Click below to read @ecpatusa 's statement & my press release: https://t.co/yJT4s7SXoQ  https://t.co/J0mqanCyiD https://t.co/dwEZJY4d8B

As we mark #VEDay75 let us thank &remember all who served &fought to end Nazi tyranny & fascism. W/ <400000 of the 16 million 🇺🇸service men &women who served in #WWII w/us today let us never forget their sacrifice. We are forever grateful for their service. Freedom isn’t free. https://t.co/DFZ1vLyLpF

Substance abuse & mental health concerns can intensify during a pandemic. Click🔗to read abt my announcement of $2+million in federal $ to combat #opioid &other #addictions; & boosting mental health services at @CPCBHC & @CFCLoud in Monmouth &Ocean Cnty.  https://t.co/zzl0p1Bdya

As a co-chair of the bipartisan Congressional Israel Allies Caucus I am pleased to join my colleagues in Congress in congratulating Israel today marking 72 years since the declaration and establishment of the State of Israel in 1948. #YomHatzmaut –Happy Independence Day Israel! https://t.co/re9TY04CUg

Looking forward to today’s #AmericaStrong flyover salute w/ @AFThunderbirds & @BlueAngels to honor our healthcare workers first responders & law enforcement. We appreciate all that you do to keep us safe during this #CoronavirusPandemic.   Timing/map for today's flyover below: https://t.co/sEeh5SZY1K

Today (Monday April 27) at 10:30 AM EDT the @SBAgov will resume accepting Paycheck Protection Program(PPP) forgivable loan applications for small businesses to continue paying workers & survive the pandemic.  For more information on the PPP visit:   https://t.co/zjoFScXbaK https://t.co/QJsPnMzfjx

On #WorldMalariaDay we are reminded of the millions who suffer from #Malaria each year. Although much progress has been achieved more needs to be done.   Click link below to read my press release:   https://t.co/vU6nZqi5CO
#ICYMI : Click link below to watch my April 22 2020 #COVIDー19 update from Freehold NJ.  https://t.co/YhosHbeATd

REMINDER: If you are a non-tax filing @SocialSecurity or Railroad Retirement Benefit recipient w/dependents; TOMORROW-April 22-BY NOON is the deadline to register for $500 per child Economic Impact Payment for qualifying individuals. Click🔗for more Info: https://t.co/YQQBCXhv1G

As April is #AutismAwarenessmonth––& esp during the #COVIDー19 pandemic––we redouble our efforts to prioritize unmet needs for individuals with ASD. Click 🔗to read my press release about the letter I sent to House & Senate leadership w/@USRepMikeDoyle.  https://t.co/G3l4Ko60BM

#ICYMI: TY @STFA_NJ & @hpaeaft for organizing a donation drive for donations of PPE gloves masks & suits. Happy to help connect @AnsellProtects to the drive. TY to them for the thousands of PPE products they donated.   Click🔗to read more:   https://t.co/fhFRbTMjXr https://t.co/rbWAYpgl2l
An inspiring message from His Eminence Archbishop @Elpidophoros—Greek Orthodox Archbishop of America— as Orthodox Christians celebrate Easter.    Click link to watch:  https://t.co/YIUG7oIMh8

@realDonaldTrump's threat to pull funding from @WHO may add additional pressure to finally-at long last-reform it. US taxpayers provide $400-$500 million each year to fund @WHO. To restore the effectiveness of @WHO we must first promote transparency.   https://t.co/ouXEq1GDZf

Special TY to Amanda & Johnny Ho of Freehold NJ Andrew Duncan of NY &Anna Cheung founder of NYers Supporting Hong Kong (NY4HK) who delivered 4000 surgical masks to @CentraState Medical Center in Freehold NJ this past weekend. Click link to read more: https://t.co/paxQPV6oss https://t.co/BA0vpRSVrK

The federal government will continue to run and support two FREE coronavirus test sites in New Jersey agreeing with the urgency in the delegation letter to FEMA I & @RepJoshG spearheaded.  Click link to read more about the announcement:  https://t.co/K0pgC01T3F https://t.co/I2vc6oMBfZ

Click links below to check the status of Direct Impact Payments to qualified taxpayers Social Security recipients and other announcements from the U.S. Department of the Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service. #CARESAct   https://t.co/pu3EZnIjPc   https://t.co/53fuP3IwL0 https://t.co/sDwkkEpWwl
https://t.co/bmNfUigWJO #2020Census https://t.co/vGw0Ol8cfj

Thanks to @theNJGlobe and @wildstein covering this important issue. Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) products will protect many of our doctors nurses other medical professionals and first responders who are giving their all on the front lines. https://t.co/pN33SA45tu

TY for all that you & fellow #alzheimers advocates do to #ENDALZ. At this time isolation is especially dangerous-it is good to check in on our seniors w/#AlzheimersDisease. Please know there are resources such as the @alzassociation helpline: 800.272.3900 if you need assistance. https://t.co/4I93wUT8jr
Happy to help in any way we can.  We are all in this together.    And thank you @centrastate for your expertise and extraordinary commitment. https://t.co/pA06Zpp1iR

The Senate has passed and sent to President Trump the #coronavirus aid package to provide relief to those impacted directly. Read my statement on House passage of this package and access important COVID-19 information on my website.   https://t.co/ulNqXnePdK

TY @BillSpadea for highlighting my landmark law-Trafficking Victims Protection Act-to assist victims(primarily women)&punish traffickers. If u are a victim or suspect a trafficking situation pls📞Nat’l Hotline @ 1-888-373-7888 or NJ Hotline 1-855-END-NJHT https://t.co/6sdb79Vxh2

TODAY I will be speaking on a panel at the @WhiteHouse on #HumanTrafficking “The 20th Anniversary of the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000”- a landmark law I authored to combat #HumanTrafficking.  Tune in via livestream at 10:30 AM EST to watch https://t.co/16H7RAFFMQ

As co-chair of the Neglected Tropical Diseases (NTD) & Malaria Caucus I welcome the inaugural #WorldNTDDay and urge everyone around the world to redouble our efforts to #BeatNTDs. My law (The End Neglected Tropical Diseases Act PL 116-94) is a start but more can be done. https://t.co/iQFB9J3ZjO

Very productive day of meetings w/Joanne & Jill informing Members of Congress on the need to educate coaches & athletes about exertional heat stroke through their advocacy of “Braeden’s Law” (HR4145).   https://t.co/MMnNQvllXi https://t.co/AA0KnJTmqX

Thank you Chairman @BobbyScott for meeting with us today. I look forward to working together on HR 4145 - Braeden's Commission: Protect our Athletes from Exertional Heat Stroke. https://t.co/8QEfdl9L2z

ICYMI: @SSAPress has a new campaign to fight scammers. If u/someone u know receives a suspicious call stating there is a problem w/their SSN/account. Hang up. Never give the caller money/personal info. Ppl should then report the scam to https://t.co/Mp0WRgDICh or 📞1.800.772.1213 https://t.co/PVdpI9pisG
